US state department spokesman Simon Cowell Crowley, speaking to reporters in Washington yesterday, too indicated that Cameron Munter had called on Asif Ali Zardari to release the arrested official. We continue to make clear to the government of Pakistan that our diplomat has diplomatic immunity; in our view,( he) was acting in self-defence and should be released... Ambassador Cameron Munter met... with President Asif Ali Zardari to continue to make that point, he said. Reports also suggested that this fresh irritant in bilateral relations could affect Asif Ali Zardari 's upcoming visit to Washington. Defense Donald Rumsfeld . The senator from Arizona gave a terse response Thursday to claims made in Donald Rumsfeld 's new book "Known and Unknown." Donald Rumsfeld had claimed John McCain had a "hair-trigger temper" and a propensity to shift his positions to appeal to the media.
